user_question: What are the current in-flight meal options for a vegan traveler on a long-haul flight with Emirates, and can you generate an image of one of these meals?
final_answer: Emirates offers a variety of vegan meal options including a chickpea and spinach stew, quinoa salad, and fruit platter. Image of a vegan meal generated. These meals need to be pre-ordered at least 24 hours before the flight.
